taxation.componant_already_apprved: This component is already approved. You cannot modify it.

taxation.approved_less_than_applied: Approved amount cannot be more than applied amount.
taxation.approved_less_than_maximum: Approved amount cannot be more than maximum amount.
taxation.approve_amount_positive: Approved amount must be a positive number.
taxation.validation_failed: Validation failed. Please check the inputs.
taxation.verified_less_than_rent: Verified amount must be less than or equal to the declared rent. Example: If rent declared is ₹15,000, verified amount should be ≤ ₹15,000.
taxation.rent_exceeds_limit: Verified rent amount cannot exceed the declared rent.
taxation.landlordPan_required: Landlord PAN is required. Example: ABCDE1234F
taxation.verified_amount_positive: Verified amount must be a positive number. Example: 15000
taxation.cityType_required: City type is required. Example: Metro or Non-Metro.
taxation.landlordName_required: Landlord name is required. Example: Mr. Ramesh Kumar
taxation.landlordAddress_required: Landlord address is required. Example: 12/3 MG Road, Bangalore, Karnataka
taxation.failed_to_add_rent_information: Selected Rent Information Can not be add
taxation.failed_to_update_rent_information: Selected Rent Information Can not be update
taxation.amount_exceeded: Approved Amount ({{approvedAmount}}) for {{componentName}} exceeds Maximum Amount ({{maximumAmount}})
taxation.all_hra_updated: All HRA income tax declarations updated successfully
taxation.failed_to_update_bulk_hra: Failed to update bulk HRA declarations
taxation.attachment_name_not_found: Attachment name not found in URL
taxation.attachment_missing: Attachment URL or name is missing
taxation.approve_amount_required: Approved Amount is required when status is Approved.
taxation.verified_amount_required: Verified Amount is required when status is Approved.
